spells.name: Acute Senses
spells.description: Subject gains a bonus on Perception checks.

spells.name: Disguise Other
spells.description: As disguise self, but affects you or another.

spells.name: Ghostly Disguise
spells.description: You look like a ghost of yourself.

spells.name: Howling Agony
spells.description: Screaming pain limits the target's actions.
